title: Tungsten wire to increase power dissipated

content.question: A fixed voltage is applied across the length of a tungsten wire. An increase in the power dissipated by the wire would result if which of the following could be increased?

choices.label: The cross-sectional area of the wire
The temperature of the wire's surroundings

content.answer: The cross-sectional area of the wire

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
